name: Wolf Street
description:
All the animals want to build their own enterprises and comes here for investment: Koala have already started a construction company that leads the market with innovative building materials and environmentally friendly ideas; the Turtle started a cab company that earned a wide customer with patience and consistent service. To promote all these businesses, Mayor Wolf has provided a favorable investment environment. Invest wisely, and you may become one of the most successful investors and institutional managers.

In Wolf Street, players will play either as a Manager or an Investor. The goal of the game is to have the most money in hand among the peers at the end of the game. Each game will have two winners: the wealthiest Manager and the wealthiest Investor.

—description from the publisher
